title: [Large-scale] Science Education Design Utilizing Narrative Aesthetics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and foundational mobile learning competencies
context.additional_context: Science education enhancement program for working professionals: 10-minute microlearning modules via mobile devices with narrative-structured content design to boost engagement

learning_goals: Learners can design scientific experiment processes by applying the Aristotelian narrative structure (exposition-development-climax-resolution).
Learners can produce instructional materials explaining scientific concepts by utilizing visual and aesthetic elements (color, layout, animation).
Learners can accurately explain molecular structure transformation processes at 80% or higher accuracy through narrative-based microlearning modules.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
